description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The Gold Mines of the World. Containing concise and practical advice for investors gathered from a personel inspection of the mines of the Transvaal, India, West Australia, Queensland, New Zealand, British Columbia and Rhodesia ... Illustrated with plans and photographs" Author: CURLE, James Herbert. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 7107.c.4." Page: 255 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1899 Publisher: Waterlow & Sons Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000838947 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
